mapper.sql: SELECT t.match_id , t.title, t.level, t.type, t.application_form , t.time, t.cost, t.state, t.invoice, t.certificate, t.reimbursement, a.rank_code , GROUP_CONCAT(m.user_id) userId , GROUP_CONCAT(m.state) userState
mapper.select:
FROM t_match t LEFT JOIN t_members m ON t.match_id = m.task_id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN t_match_member_awards a ON t.match_id = a.task_id where 1=1
AND title like CONCAT('%',#{match.title},'%')
AND state = #{match.state}
AND reimbursement =#{match.reimbursement}
time >= '${item}'
time <= '${item}'
AND (select GROUP_CONCAT(u1.full_name) from t_user u1 LEFT JOIN t_members m1 on u1.user_id = m1.user_id where m1.task_id = t.match_id) like CONCAT('%',#{match.fullName},'%')
AND (select full_name from t_user u1 LEFT JOIN t_members m1 on u1.user_id = m1.user_id where m1.task_id = t.match_id and m1.state = 1) like CONCAT('%',#{match.chargeFullName},'%')
AND (select full_name from t_user u1 LEFT JOIN t_members m1 on u1.user_id = m1.user_id where m1.task_id = t.match_id and m1.state = 3) like CONCAT('%',#{match.teacherFullName},'%')
AND t.level = #{match.level}
GROUP BY t.match_id,a.rank_code
